title: Long Hard Ride
description: Rough Riders series, Book 1 Kinkaid itches for a wild western adventure with an untamed man. Enter Colby McKay, bull rider, saddle bronc buster and calf roper. He knows he's found a woman who's up to the challenge of cutting loose. Intrigued by Channing's bold proposition to "horse around" on the road, Colby proposes sexual escapades not only in his bed, but in those of his two rodeo travelling partners. Can Channing give up total control? Especially when not all is as it seems with the sexy trio?
author: Lorelei James
